warezcdn.title: Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjou, Arui wa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen

imdb.title: Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjou, Arui wa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen
imdb.plot: As a war rages on between a machine-based empire and a magic-focused empire, a witch and a soldier meet and fall in love. Will their romance bring an end to their nations' conflict?

episodes.title: The Encounter of the Two Nations' Ultimate Weapons
episodes.plot: Two nations, the Empire and the Nebulis Sovereignty, have been at war for 100 years. Imprisoned for freeing a witch, Iska is given a chance at freedom. In exchange, he must take down a powerful astral mage known as the "Ice Calamity Witch."

episodes.title: Encounter: The Enemy You and I Met Was...
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Encounter: Successor of the Black Steel and the Ice Calamity Witch
episodes.plot: Iska is given a new mission to apprehend the Ice Calamity Witch. By accomplishing the mission, Iska will be a step closer to realizing his dream for a peace treaty. When Iska and Alice meet again, they weren't prepared for what was coming for them.

episodes.title: Intersection: Battle for the Vortex
episodes.plot: 100 years ago, a drift of astral energy created a vortex which cursed, or gifted, people with astral power. Now another vortex has formed, triggering a race between the Empire and the Nebulis Sovereignty to acquire it.

episodes.title: Intersection: Awakening of the Vortex
episodes.plot: The members of Unit N07 successfully locate the vortex, but the Sovereignty had already found it. After Mismis is captured, Iska must fight against Kissing, a purebred, to get her back before the Empire attacks the Sovereignty base.

episodes.title: Paradise: Rin's Big Miscalculation
episodes.plot: Iska and Mismis survive the eruption of the vortex, but the team doesn't escape unscathed. Meanwhile, Alice decides to go search for Iska in Ein again. They are reunited by fate, but everything is jeopardized when Rin makes a big miscalculation.

episodes.title: Paradise: Alice's Longest Night
episodes.plot: Alice is forced to kidnap Iska. Afraid of what will happen to him if word gets out, Alice orders Rin to take them to the Prison Sector to decide their next move. Meanwhile, the members of Unit N07 infiltrate the Sovereignty to get Iska back.

episodes.title: Paradise: The Transcendent Demon
